name: Toward the Light
description:
A short narrative game made for the Black and White Jam #0.(9).  Many thanks to Niall D. for the music.

The theme of the jam was "death is just the beginning". In this game you play a teenager who killed herself (see trigger warnings for more info). Move using the arrow keys and click to advance the dialogues.

Trigger warnings (a bit spoilery):

- suicide (obviously)
- depression
- medical mistreatment
- bullying
